dc_title_s: Geographical, statistical, and historical map of Colombia
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially.; "Meridian of Wash." and "Lon. west from Londn."; "No. 47" -- upper right corner of map sheet.; From: Carey & Lea's American atlas.; Includes text "Colombia."|22 x 27 centimeters, sheet 44 x 53 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:10,000,000|General Map Collection
